author: Erich Schwartzel
title: ‘Avengers: Infinity War’ Has Huge Opening in China
text:
LOS ANGELES—Three weeks after setting records with its opening in the U.S., “Avengers: Infinity War” opened to gargantuan returns in China.
The premiere of Walt Disney Co.’s superhero epic took in an estimated $200 million in the world’s second-largest box-office market, surpassing the record set by the local release “Monster Hunt 2” by about $13 million. Measured in local currency, the “Infinity War” opening was second to last year’s “The Fate of the Furious.”
